---

# Types, Enums & Constants

## –û–±–∑–æ—Ä

–¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–∏–ø—ã, –µ–Ω–∞–º—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞. –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ templates, –≤–∞–ª–∏–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

<Callout type="info" title="–í–∞–∂–Ω–æ">
  –í—Å–µ —Ç–∏–ø—ã —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –¥–ª—è –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤–æ –≤—Å–µ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–µ
  –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞.
</Callout>

## Blueprint Types

### Blueprint ID

```typescript
export enum BlueprintType {
  SERVICE = "service", // –ï–¥–∏–Ω—ã–π blueprint –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ (ElysiaJS/Hono)
  // –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ: API Gateway - —ç—Ç–æ Traefik (—É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è Runner Agent), –Ω–µ –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ templates
}

export type BlueprintId = BlueprintType | string; // –î–ª—è –∫–∞—Å—Ç–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö blueprints
```

### Blueprint Category

```typescript
export enum BlueprintCategory {
  CRUD = "crud",
  AUTH = "auth",
  PAYMENT = "payment",
  NOTIFICATION = "notification",
  ANALYTICS = "analytics",
  CUSTOM = "custom",
}
```

### Service Type

```typescript
export enum ServiceType {
  GENERATED = "generated", // –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã (ElysiaJS/Hono)
}
```

## Validation Levels

```typescript
export enum ValidationLevel {
  STRUCTURAL = "structural",
  CONTRACT = "contract",
  TYPESCRIPT = "typescript",
  BUILD = "build",
  HEALTH = "health",
  CONTRACT_DISCOVERY = "discovery",
}

export const VALIDATION_LEVELS: ValidationLevel[] = [
  ValidationLevel.STRUCTURAL,
  ValidationLevel.CONTRACT,
  ValidationLevel.TYPESCRIPT,
  ValidationLevel.BUILD,
  ValidationLevel.HEALTH,
  ValidationLevel.CONTRACT_DISCOVERY,
];

export interface ValidationResult {
  valid: boolean;
  level: ValidationLevel;
  errors?: string[];
  warnings?: string[];
  metadata?: Record<string, unknown>;
}
```

## Component Types

```typescript
export enum ComponentType {
  MAIN_ENTRY = "main-entry",
  RABBITMQ_SERVER = "rabbitmq-server",
  RABBITMQ_CLIENT = "rabbitmq-client",
  HEALTH_CHECK = "health-check",
  REPOSITORY = "repository",
  DRIZZLE_SCHEMA = "drizzle-schema",
  DRIZZLE_REPOSITORY = "drizzle-repository",
  DATABASE_CONNECTION = "database-connection",
  PROTOBUF_SERVICE = "protobuf-service",
  CONFIG = "config",
  DOCKERFILE = "dockerfile",
  // –î–ª—è —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è: –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–∏–ø—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
  // –ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: TYPEORM_SCHEMA = "typeorm-schema"
}

export const REQUIRED_COMPONENTS: Record<BlueprintType, ComponentType[]> = {
  [BlueprintType.SERVICE]: [
    ComponentType.MAIN_ENTRY,
    ComponentType.RABBITMQ_SERVER,
    ComponentType.HEALTH_CHECK,
    // –ë–î –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –æ–ø—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ database node
  ],
};
```

## LLM Generation Points

```typescript
export enum LLMGenerationPoint {
  SERVICE_METHODS = "service-methods", // –ë–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∞ –≤ service.ts
  HANDLER_LOGIC = "handler-logic", // –õ–æ–≥–∏–∫–∞ –≤ handlers (—Ä–µ–¥–∫–æ)
}

export interface LLMGenerationConfig {
  point: LLMGenerationPoint;
  file: string; // –ü—É—Ç—å –∫ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—É
  template: string; // –ü—É—Ç—å –∫ template
  constraints: string[]; // –û–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è LLM
  instructions: string; // –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è LLM
}
```

## Database Types

```typescript
export enum DatabaseType {
  POSTGRESQL = "postgresql",
  MYSQL = "mysql",
}

export enum ORMType {
  DRIZZLE = "drizzle",
  // –î–ª—è —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è: –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ ORM
  // –ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: TYPEORM = "typeorm", SEQUELIZE = "sequelize"
  // –°–º. EXTENSIBILITY.md –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–π –ø–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö ORM
}

export enum FieldType {
  STRING = "string",
  NUMBER = "number",
  BOOLEAN = "boolean",
  DATE = "date",
  UUID = "uuid",
  TEXT = "text",
  JSON = "json",
}

export interface FieldConfig {
  name: string;
  type: FieldType;
  required: boolean;
  unique?: boolean;
  defaultValue?: unknown;
  validation?: Record<string, unknown>;
}

export interface DatabaseNodeData {
  databaseType: DatabaseType;
  orm: ORMType;
  connectionName: string;
  projectId: string;
  config?: {
    host?: string;
    port?: number;
    database?: string;
  };
}

export const ORM_TEMPLATES: Record<ORMType, ComponentType[]> = {
  [ORMType.DRIZZLE]: [
    ComponentType.DRIZZLE_SCHEMA,
    ComponentType.DRIZZLE_REPOSITORY,
  ],
  // –î–ª—è —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è: –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–π –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ ORM –∑–¥–µ—Å—å
  // –°–º. EXTENSIBILITY.md –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–π
};

export function getORMComponents(orm: ORMType): ComponentType[] {
  return ORM_TEMPLATES[orm] || [];
}
```

## Message Patterns

```typescript
export enum MessagePatternType {
  REQUEST_RESPONSE = "request-response",
  PUBLISH_SUBSCRIBE = "publish-subscribe",
  ONE_WAY = "one-way",
}

export interface MessagePattern {
  service: string;
  action: string;
  type: MessagePatternType;
  requestType: string;
  responseType: string;
}
```

## Resilience Patterns

```typescript
export enum ResiliencePattern {
  RETRY = "retry",
  CIRCUIT_BREAKER = "circuit-breaker",
  TIMEOUT = "timeout",
  FALLBACK = "fallback",
  GRACEFUL_SHUTDOWN = "graceful-shutdown",
  HEALTH_CHECK = "health-check",
}

export enum CircuitBreakerState {
  CLOSED = "closed",
  OPEN = "open",
  HALF_OPEN = "half-open",
}

export enum HealthStatus {
  HEALTHY = "healthy",
  DEGRADED = "degraded",
  UNHEALTHY = "unhealthy",
}
```

## Validation Status

```typescript
export enum ValidationStatus {
  PENDING = "pending",
  RUNNING = "running",
  PASSED = "passed",
  FAILED = "failed",
  SKIPPED = "skipped",
}

export interface ValidationReport {
  serviceName: string;
  blueprint: BlueprintType;
  status: ValidationStatus;
  steps: ValidationStep[];
  startedAt: Date;
  completedAt?: Date;
  duration?: number;
}

export interface ValidationStep {
  level: ValidationLevel;
  status: ValidationStatus;
  result: ValidationResult;
  duration?: number;
}
```

## üîó Contract Types

```typescript
export enum ContractType {
  REQUEST = "request",
  RESPONSE = "response",
  EVENT = "event",
}

export interface ProtobufContract {
  service: string;
  method: string;
  type: ContractType;
  message: string;
  fields: FieldConfig[];
}
```

## üöÄ Deployment Types

```typescript
export enum DeploymentStatus {
  PENDING = "pending",
  BUILDING = "building",
  DEPLOYING = "deploying",
  RUNNING = "running",
  FAILED = "failed",
  STOPPED = "stopped",
}

export enum ServerStatus {
  ONLINE = "online",
  OFFLINE = "offline",
  MAINTENANCE = "maintenance",
}
```

## Template Variables

```typescript
export enum VariableType {
  STRING = "string",
  NUMBER = "number",
  BOOLEAN = "boolean",
  ARRAY = "array",
  OBJECT = "object",
  CODE = "code", // –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–π –∫–æ–¥
}

export interface TemplateVariable {
  name: string;
  type: VariableType;
  required: boolean;
  description: string;
  defaultValue?: unknown;
  blueprint?: BlueprintType[]; // –í –∫–∞–∫–∏—Ö blueprints –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è
}
```

## Framework Types

```typescript
export enum FrameworkType {
  ELYSIA = "elysia",
  HONO = "hono",
}

export const FRAMEWORK_BY_BLUEPRINT: Record<BlueprintType, FrameworkType> = {
  [BlueprintType.SERVICE]: FrameworkType.ELYSIA,
};
```

## Configuration Constants

```typescript
export const DEFAULT_CONFIG = {
  PORT: 3000,
  RABBITMQ_QUEUE_PREFIX: "axion",
  HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL: 30000, // 30 seconds
  CIRCUIT_BREAKER_THRESHOLD: 5,
  CIRCUIT_BREAKER_TIMEOUT: 60000, // 1 minute
  RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS: 3,
  RETRY_INITIAL_DELAY: 500,
  TIMEOUT_DEFAULT: 5000, // 5 seconds
} as const;

export const VALIDATION_TIMEOUTS: Record<ValidationLevel, number> = {
  [ValidationLevel.STRUCTURAL]: 1000,
  [ValidationLevel.CONTRACT]: 2000,
  [ValidationLevel.TYPESCRIPT]: 10000,
  [ValidationLevel.BUILD]: 30000,
  [ValidationLevel.HEALTH]: 60000,
  [ValidationLevel.CONTRACT_DISCOVERY]: 30000,
};
```

## üìÅ File Paths

```typescript
export const TEMPLATE_PATHS = {
  BLUEPRINTS: "templates/blueprints",
  COMPONENTS: "templates/components",
  RULES: "templates/rules",
  EXAMPLES: "templates/examples",
} as const;

export const GENERATED_PATHS = {
  SERVICES: "apps/_services",
  PROTO: "proto",
  SCHEMA: "src/database/schema.ts",
  REPOSITORY: "src/database/repository.ts",
  SERVICE: "src/modules/{entity}/{entity}.service.ts",
  HANDLER: "src/modules/{entity}/{entity}.handler.ts",
  MAIN: "src/main.ts",
} as const;
```

## Helper Functions

```typescript
// Type guards
export function isBlueprintType(value: string): value is BlueprintType {
  return Object.values(BlueprintType).includes(value as BlueprintType);
}

export function isValidationLevel(value: string): value is ValidationLevel {
  return Object.values(ValidationLevel).includes(value as ValidationLevel);
}

export function isComponentType(value: string): value is ComponentType {
  return Object.values(ComponentType).includes(value as ComponentType);
}

// Getters
export function getRequiredComponents(
  blueprint: BlueprintType
): ComponentType[] {
  return REQUIRED_COMPONENTS[blueprint] || [];
}

export function getFrameworkType(blueprint: BlueprintType): FrameworkType {
  return FRAMEWORK_BY_BLUEPRINT[blueprint] || FrameworkType.ELYSIA;
}

export function getValidationTimeout(level: ValidationLevel): number {
  return VALIDATION_TIMEOUTS[level] || 5000;
}
```

## üìö Usage Examples

```typescript
// –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
import {
  BlueprintType,
  ComponentType,
  getRequiredComponents,
  getFrameworkType,
} from "./types";

const blueprint = BlueprintType.SERVICE;
const components = getRequiredComponents(blueprint);
const framework = getFrameworkType(blueprint);

// –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –≤–∞–ª–∏–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏
import { ValidationLevel, VALIDATION_LEVELS, ValidationStatus } from "./types";

for (const level of VALIDATION_LEVELS) {
  const result = await validate(level);
  if (result.status === ValidationStatus.FAILED) {
    break;
  }
}
```

---

_–í—Å–µ —Ç–∏–ø—ã, –µ–Ω–∞–º—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç—ã —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –∑–¥–µ—Å—å –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏._
